column2: UPDATE 1-Obama to business: tell your lawmakers to renew Ex-Im Bank (Adds response from Republican congressman in paragraphs 7
column3: 8) ~Obama to business: tell your lawmakers to renew Ex-Im Bank WASHINGTON
column4: Aug 23 President Barack Obama on Saturday urged business owners to press Congress to reauthorize the U.S. Export-Import Bank
column5: which could halt any new financing Sept. 30 - as some conservative Republicans hope it will - if lawmakers fail to act. ~

column2: UPDATE 1-Russian Deputy PM says no plans to ban McDonald's - Itar-Tass MOSCOW
column3: Aug 23 Russian authorities are not planning to close the McDonald's chain in the country
column4: Deputy Prime Minister Arkady Dvorkovich was quoted saying on Saturday
column5: after inspectors visited a number of restaurants run by the fast-food company. ~Russian Deputy PM says no plans to ban McDonald's - report MOSCOW
column6: Aug 23 Russian authorities are not planning to close down the McDonald's chain of fast food restaurants in the country
column7: Itar-Tass news agency quoted Deputy Prime Minister Arkady Dvorkovich as saying on Saturday. ~
